articles.title: Wash Trading
articles.description: Transactions which give, or are likely to give, false or misleading signals as to the supply of, demand for, or price of a financial instrument

articles.title: Price Manipulation
articles.description: Transactions which secure, or are likely to secure, the price of one or several financial instruments at an abnormal or artificial level

articles.title: Spoofing / Layering
articles.description: Orders to trade which employ a fictitious device or any other form of deception or contrivance

articles.title: Insider Dealing
articles.description: Prohibition of insider dealing and of unlawful disclosure of inside information

articles.title: Surveillance Obligation
articles.description: Obligation to detect and report suspicious orders and transactions

articles.title: Organisational Requirements
articles.description: Investment firms shall establish adequate policies and procedures to ensure compliance, including effective surveillance systems

articles.title: Order Record Keeping
articles.description: Clock synchronisation and order record keeping obligations

regulations.name: Dodd-Frank
regulations.full_name: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act

articles.title: Anti-Manipulation
articles.description: Prohibition of spoofing, market manipulation, and disruptive trading practices

articles.title: Marking the Close
articles.description: Prohibition of trading activity designed to influence the closing price

articles.title: Reporting Obligation
articles.description: Counterparties and CCPs shall report details of derivative contracts to trade repositories

articles.title: Risk Mitigation Techniques
articles.description: Timely confirmation, portfolio reconciliation, dispute resolution for non-centrally cleared OTC derivatives

regulations.name: SEC
regulations.full_name: U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission Rules

articles.title: Insider Trading
articles.description: Employment of manipulative and deceptive devices — prohibits fraud in connection with purchase or sale of securities

articles.title: Market Manipulation
articles.description: Prohibition of transactions creating actual or apparent active trading to induce purchases or sales
